items.sentence: Tom pulled out another document and laid it on the table.
Tom resolved the situation without resorting to violence.

Tom got some chewing gum stuck on the bottom of his shoe.
Tom didn\'t know what to say, so he didn\'t say anything.
Tom knew the names of every baseball player on that team.
I didn\'t want any of my friends to know I was in prison.
If there\'s something you don\'t understand, let me know.
Tom and Mary said that they talked about that last night.

Tom didn\'t want to eat the banana, but he ate it anyway.
Thanks very much for having me to dinner the other night.
That was more difficult to do than I thought it would be.
